title: Image Resizer
subtitle: Resize images while maintaining quality
supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, WebP
resizeInfo: Image resizing is the process of changing the dimensions of an image while maintaining its visual quality. This is useful for optimizing images for web, social media, or storage.
tip1: Maintain aspect ratio to prevent distortion
tip2: Use higher quality for important images
tip3: Consider file size for web optimization
tip4: Test different sizes for different platforms
